desc: mShrink is a utility program for making smaller versions of a FITS file by averaging NxN blocks of pixels spatially.  N can be fractional.

arguments.name: hdu
arguments.desc: Optional HDU offset for input file.

arguments.name: shrinkFactor
arguments.desc: Scale factor for spatial shrinking.  Can be any positive real number.

arguments.name: fixedSize
arguments.desc: Alternate mode: shrink so the output fits in this many pixels.
